notes.title: Data availability
notes.p: The historical data that support the findings of this study are available from the Laboratoire d’Écologie Historique et de Dendrochronologie (dominique_arseneault@uqar.ca) upon reasonable request. Modern forest data are freely available from the Ministère des Forêts, de la Faune et des Parcs du Québec website ( https://mffp.gouv.qc.ca/le-ministere/acces-aux-donnees-gratuites/).
